nodes.text: Resolute was an Invincible-class Dreadnaught used by the Corporate Sector Authority early on in the reign of the Galactic Empire. Her commander was Angela Krin.

The vessel blockaded the Tion Cluster world Endregaad following an outbreak of a plague. This was to ensure that the plague would not spread beyond this planet.
During this action, the Resolute intercepted the freighter Shadowfire which had been sent by Popara the Hutt to rescue his child, Mika, who was stuck on the planet.
The Resolute appears only in the adventure Tempest Feud, which has no specific chronological placement, other than occurring sometime between 100 BBY and 40 ABY.
